content: citrus dreams baby blanket by mary stover 2 skeins of baby bee sweet delight pomp in mint charm h crochet hook 5 0 mm gauge 3 row = 2 inches 14 stitches = 4 inches dimensions 27 x 35 the openwork row remind me of orange pips stitch make three double crochets together and the seed pattern of other citrus fruits this over five stitches skipping stitches two and pattern is a simpler version of jeanne four and drawing up yarn through stitches one steinhilber s gentle waves baby blanket it can three and five the center should always be the be made with a variety of yarns the beginning 3 double_crochet decrease from previous row chain 1 skip one chain can be any multiple of eight plus four stitch * double_crochet chain 1 double when using a more heavyweight yarn stitches crochet chain 1 double_crochet in center stitch can be made in the back stitch only to give the of 3dc at top of peak chain 1 skip one stitch piece more texture make three double crochets together over next five stitches chain 1 * repeat pattern until 3dc decrease yarn over and insert hook into first end of row two double crochets in top of indicated stitch yarn over and draw through turning chain two loops repeat two more times in indicated stitches there should be four loops on the row 3 solid row chain 3 double_crochet in hook yarn over and draw through all four same stitch two double crochets in next stitch stitches make three double crochets together 3dc decrease over next three stitches which are the space beginning chain chain 100 before the 3dc decrease the 3dc decrease and the space following the 3dc decrease * double_crochet in next row 1 foundation row double_crochet in 4th stitch double_crochet in next space make chain from hook double_crochet in next two three double crochets in next stitch center of stitches make three double crochets together double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet decrease over next three stitches * double space double_crochet in next stitch make 3 double_crochet crochet in next two stitches make three decrease over next space stitch and space * repeat double crochets in next stitch double_crochet pattern until end of row make two double in next two stitches make one double_crochet crochets in next stitch and two double crochets over next three stitches 3 double_crochet decrease * repeat in top of turning chain pattern until end of row double_crochet in next two stitches and two double crochets in repeat row 2 and 3 until piece measures as last stitch desired end with a solid row row 3 row 2 openwork row chain 3 double weave in ends crochet in same stitch chain 1 skip next
